attributes.action: extend the time period for abortion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many girls get into trouble at a young age which includes getting pregnant. victims of rape also may fall pregnant, but the time period for an abortion is rather short (usually 12 weeks), some girls don't even get the chance to have one.

rejection.details: The current upper time limit for abortions is 24 weeks, not 12.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
